name: koha-snippets
description: code to be pasted into Koha's admin side

scripts.js: uglifyjs js/*.js --compress --mangle --screw-ie8 --enclose > dist/OPACUserJS.js --preamble "// minified on $(date), see source & documentation at GITHUB REPO TBD" --name-cache .uglify-name-cache

author: phette23 <phette23@gmail.com> (http://phette.net)
